mainContent.title: Welcome to PabCap
mainContent.description: PabCap is a digital platform dedicated to publishing and distributing documents created by developers. Our goal is to offer an organized and accessible space where professionals can share their work, projects, and research, while readers are free to view, download, and use them as needed.  With a focus on openness, collaboration, and resource availability, PabCap positions itself as a meeting point for creators and users interested in high-quality technical and educational content.

galleryItems.title: PabCap Publish
galleryItems.description: This frame was created right after the launch of this website under the github.io domain. I look forward to seeing this platform grow, reach its full potential, and eventually adopt independent domains and additional enhancements.
